VERIFY_INPUT_PARAMS.INVALID_CONFIG_INPUT: The config file is either missing or the path of config file seems incorrect. Ensure that the file is a .json file.
VERIFY_INPUT_PARAMS.INVALID_CONFIG_FILE: The specified config json file is not compatible with the expected Shell Template schema.

VERIFY_INPUT_PARAMS.INVALID_PROJECT_CONFIG_JSON: The existing project-config.json file does not match with its schema. Please correct the errors to proceed.

QUESTIONS.CONFIG_FILE: Please enter the location of the config file
QUESTIONS.PROJECT_NAME: Please enter the new name for the project
QUESTIONS.USE_WEBXPANEL: Please select the value for useWebXPanel

PROCESS_REQUEST.FAILURE_MESSAGE_INPUT_PARAM_CONFIG_FILE_: The input config file is invalid.
PROCESS_REQUEST.PROJECT_CONFIG_VALIDATION_FAILED: The generated project-config.json file is not compatible with the expected Shell Template schema.
